text: Daredevil is a 2003 American superhero movie directed and written by Mark Steven Johnson. It was based on the Marvel character Daredevil by Stan Lee. Daredevil's main actors are Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Michael Clarke Duncan, and Collin Farrell. == Cast == *Ben Affleck as Matt Murdock / Daredevil *Jennifer Garner as Elektra Natchios *Michael Clarke Duncan as Wilson Fisk / Kingpin *Collin Farrell as Bullseye *Joe Pantoliano as Ben Ulrich *Jon Favreau as Franklin "Foggy" Nelson *David Keith as Jack "The Devil" Murdock == Director's Cut == In November 2004, Johnson released a director's cut which restored 30 minutes of footage including a subplot with Coolio as Dante Jackson. == References == Category:2003 movies Category:2003 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Swiss movies Category:English-language movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:Daredevil (movie series) Category:Film noir Category:Movies directed by Mark Steven Johnson Category:Movies produced by Avi Arad Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Screenplays by Mark Steven Johnson Category:Superhero drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American superhero movies
title: Daredevil (movie)
